title: Positive Loop
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Thank you, Kotori-san. This Rina-chan’s board that I’m going to use for my live is now very cute. Rina-chan’s board「Smile」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>You’re welcome. I’m really looking forward to seeing you use it on your next live, Rina-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want to thank you. Is there.... anything I could do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eh? It’s fine, you don’t have to!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>No, I insist. Last time.... when I fixed your earphone, you made me an apple pie. This time, I want to also return the favor.... with something I’m good at.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>....Fufu, thank you! Then, I wonder what I should ask for~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Don’t hold back. Rina-chan’s board「Fidgety」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Well.... I’ll go and make some tea for now. After that, you can help me figure out what I could ask for, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Of course. I’ll help you think of something.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, it might take a while, so I’ll also bring out some cookies I made yesterday. They turned out really good~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
